CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get -y install   procps   build-essential   python   wget
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /usr/local/src &&   mkdir node &&   cd node &&   wget http://nodejs.org/dist/v$NODE_VERSION/node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.gz &&   tar -xzvf node-v$NODE_VERSION.tar.gz &&   cd node-v$NODE_VERSION &&   ./configure &&   make &&   make install &&   rm -rf /usr/local/src/node
